045import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.GetDisplayPassword;
046import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.ModifyVm;
047import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.ResetVm;
048import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;

074/**
075 * The Class {@link VmMgmt}.
076 */
077@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects",
078    "PMD.ExcessiveImports" })
079public class VmMgmt extends FreeMarkerConlet<VmMgmt.VmsModel> {
080
081    private Class<?> preferredIpVersion = Inet4Address.class;
082    private boolean deleteConnectionFile = true;
083    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES = RenderMode.asSet(
084        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.View);
085    private final ChannelTracker<String, VmChannel,
086            VmDefinition> channelTracker = new ChannelTracker<>();
087    private final TimeSeries summarySeries = new TimeSeries(Duration.ofDays(1));
088    private Summary cachedSummary;
089
090    /**
091     * The periodically generated update event.
092     */
093    public static class Update extends Event<Void> {
094    }
095
096    /**
097     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
098     * 
099     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
100     * on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
101     * sends the event to
102     */
103    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConstructorCallsOverridableMethod")
104    public VmMgmt(Channel componentChannel) {
105        super(componentChannel);
106        setPeriodicRefresh(Duration.ofMinutes(1), () -> new Update());
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Configure the component. 
111     * 
112     * @param event the event
113     */
114    @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
115    @Handler
116    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
117        event.structured("/Manager/GuiHttpServer"
118            + "/ConsoleWeblet/WebConsole/ComponentCollector/VmAccess")
119            .ifPresent(c -> {
120                try {
121                    var dispRes = (Map<String, Object>) c
122                        .getOrDefault("displayResource",
123                            Collections.emptyMap());
124                    switch ((String) dispRes.getOrDefault("preferredIpVersion",
125                        "")) {
126                    case "ipv6":
127                        preferredIpVersion = Inet6Address.class;
128                        break;
129                    case "ipv4":
130                    default:
131                        preferredIpVersion = Inet4Address.class;
132                        break;
133                    }
134
135                    // Delete connection file
136                    deleteConnectionFile
137                        = Optional.ofNullable(c.get("deleteConnectionFile"))
138                            .filter(v -> v instanceof String)
139                            .map(v -> (String) v)
140                            .map(Boolean::parseBoolean).orElse(true);
141                } catch (ClassCastException e) {
142                    logger.config("Malformed configuration: " + e.getMessage());
143                }
144            });
145    }
146
147    /**
148     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
149     *
150     * @param event the event
151     * @param channel the channel
152     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
153     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
154     *             exception
155     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
156     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
157     */
158    @Handler
159    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleConnection channel)
160            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
161            ParseException, IOException {
162        // Add conlet resources to page
163        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
164            .setDisplayNames(
165                localizations(channel.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
166            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview)
167            .addScript(new ScriptResource().setScriptType("module")
168                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
169                    type(), "VmMgmt-functions.js"))));
170    }
171
172    @Override
173    protected Optional<VmsModel> createStateRepresentation(Event<?> event,
174            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
175        return Optional.of(new VmsModel(conletId));
176    }
177
178    @Override
179    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
180    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
181            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, VmsModel conletState)
182            throws Exception {
183        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = EnumSet.noneOf(RenderMode.class);
184        boolean sendVmInfos = false;
185        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
186            Template tpl
187                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmMgmt-preview.ftl.html");
188            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
189                processTemplate(event, tpl,
190                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState)))
191                        .setRenderAs(
192                            RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
193                        .setSupportedModes(MODES));
194            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Preview);
195            channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
196                conletId, "summarySeries", summarySeries.entries()));
197            var summary = evaluateSummary(false);
198            channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
199                conletId, "updateSummary", summary));
200            sendVmInfos = true;
201        }
202        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.View)) {
203            Template tpl
204                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmMgmt-view.ftl.html");
205            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
206                processTemplate(event, tpl,
207                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState)))
208                        .setRenderAs(
209                            RenderMode.View.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
210                        .setSupportedModes(MODES));
211            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.View);
212            sendVmInfos = true;
213        }
214        if (sendVmInfos) {
215            for (var item : channelTracker.values()) {
216                updateVm(channel, conletId, item.associated());
217            }
218        }
219        return renderedAs;
220    }
221
222    private void updateVm(ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId,
223            VmDefinition vmDef) {
224        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(channel.session())
225            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
226        var roles = WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(channel.session())
227            .stream().map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList();
228        channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(), conletId, "updateVm",
229            simplifiedVmDefinition(vmDef, user, roles)));
230    }
231
232    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals")
233    private Map<String, Object> simplifiedVmDefinition(VmDefinition vmDef,
234            String user, List<String> roles) {
235        // Convert RAM sizes to unitless numbers
236        var spec = DataPath.deepCopy(vmDef.spec());
237        var vmSpec = DataPath.<Map<String, Object>> get(spec, "vm").get();
238        vmSpec.put("maximumRam", Quantity.fromString(
239            DataPath.<String> get(vmSpec, "maximumRam").orElse("0")).getNumber()
240            .toBigInteger());
241        vmSpec.put("currentRam", Quantity.fromString(
242            DataPath.<String> get(vmSpec, "currentRam").orElse("0")).getNumber()
243            .toBigInteger());
244        var status = DataPath.deepCopy(vmDef.status());
245        status.put("ram", Quantity.fromString(
246            DataPath.<String> get(status, "ram").orElse("0")).getNumber()
247            .toBigInteger());
248
249        // Build result
250        return Map.of("metadata",
251            Map.of("namespace", vmDef.namespace(),
252                "name", vmDef.name()),
253            "spec", spec,
254            "status", status,
255            "nodeName", vmDef.extra("nodeName"),
256            "permissions", vmDef.permissionsFor(user, roles).stream()
257                .map(VmDefinition.Permission::toString).toList());
258    }
259
260    /**
261     * Track the VM definitions.
262     *
263     * @param event the event
264     * @param channel the channel
265     * @throws IOException 
266     */
267    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
268    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ConfusingTernary", "PMD.CognitiveComplexity",
269        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals",
270        "PMD.ConfusingArgumentToVarargsMethod" })
271    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel)
272            throws IOException {
273        var vmName = event.vmDefinition().name();
274        if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED) {
275            channelTracker.remove(vmName);
276            for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
277                for (String conletId : entry.getValue()) {
278                    entry.getKey().respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
279                        conletId, "removeVm", vmName));
280                }
281            }
282        } else {
283            var vmDef = event.vmDefinition();
284            channelTracker.put(vmName, channel, vmDef);
285            for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
286                for (String conletId : entry.getValue()) {
287                    updateVm(entry.getKey(), conletId, vmDef);
288                }
289            }
290        }
291
292        var summary = evaluateSummary(true);
293        summarySeries.add(Instant.now(), summary.usedCpus, summary.usedRam);
294        for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
295            for (String conletId : entry.getValue()) {
296                entry.getKey().respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
297                    conletId, "updateSummary", summary));
298            }
299        }
300    }
301
302    /**
303     * Handle the periodic update event by sending {@link NotifyConletView}
304     * events.
305     *
306     * @param event the event
307     * @param connection the console connection
308     */
309    @Handler
310    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
311    public void onUpdate(Update event, ConsoleConnection connection) {
312        var summary = evaluateSummary(false);
313        summarySeries.add(Instant.now(), summary.usedCpus, summary.usedRam);
314        for (String conletId : conletIds(connection)) {
315            connection.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
316                conletId, "updateSummary", summary));
317        }
318    }
319
320    /**
321     * The Class Summary.
322     */
323    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
324    public static class Summary {
325
326        /** The total vms. */
327        public int totalVms;
328
329        /** The running vms. */
330        public long runningVms;
331
332        /** The used cpus. */
333        public long usedCpus;
334
335        /** The used ram. */
336        public BigInteger usedRam = BigInteger.ZERO;
337
338        /**
339         * Gets the total vms.
340         *
341         * @return the totalVms
342         */
343        public int getTotalVms() {
344            return totalVms;
345        }
346
347        /**
348         * Gets the running vms.
349         *
350         * @return the runningVms
351         */
352        public long getRunningVms() {
353            return runningVms;
354        }
355
356        /**
357         * Gets the used cpus.
358         *
359         * @return the usedCpus
360         */
361        public long getUsedCpus() {
362            return usedCpus;
363        }
364
365        /**
366         * Gets the used ram. Returned as String for Json rendering.
367         *
368         * @return the usedRam
369         */
370        public String getUsedRam() {
371            return usedRam.toString();
372        }
373
374    }
375
376    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition",
377        "PMD.LambdaCanBeMethodReference" })
378    private Summary evaluateSummary(boolean force) {
379        if (!force && cachedSummary != null) {
380            return cachedSummary;
381        }
382        Summary summary = new Summary();
383        for (var vmDef : channelTracker.associated()) {
384            summary.totalVms += 1;
385            summary.usedCpus += vmDef.<Number> fromStatus("cpus")
386                .map(Number::intValue).orElse(0);
387            summary.usedRam = summary.usedRam
388                .add(vmDef.<String> fromStatus("ram")
389                    .map(r -> Quantity.fromString(r).getNumber().toBigInteger())
390                    .orElse(BigInteger.ZERO));
391            if (vmDef.conditionStatus("Running").orElse(false)) {
392                summary.runningVms += 1;
393            }
394        }
395        cachedSummary = summary;
396        return summary;
397    }
398
399    @Override
400    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidDecimalLiteralsInBigDecimalConstructor",
401        "PMD.NcssCount" })
402    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
403            ConsoleConnection channel, VmsModel model) throws Exception {
404        event.stop();
405        String vmName = event.param(0);
406        var value = channelTracker.value(vmName);
407        var vmChannel = value.map(v -> v.channel()).orElse(null);
408        var vmDef = value.map(v -> v.associated()).orElse(null);
409        if (vmDef == null) {
410            return;
411        }
412        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(channel.session())
413            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse("");
414        var roles = WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(channel.session())
415            .stream().map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList();
416        var perms = vmDef.permissionsFor(user, roles);
417        switch (event.method()) {
418        case "start":
419            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.START)) {
420                fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Running", vmChannel));
421            }
422            break;
423        case "stop":
424            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.STOP)) {
425                fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Stopped", vmChannel));
426            }
427            break;
428        case "reset":
429            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.RESET)) {
430                confirmReset(event, channel, model, vmName);
431            }
432            break;
433        case "resetConfirmed":
434            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.RESET)) {
435                fire(new ResetVm(vmName), vmChannel);
436            }
437            break;
438        case "openConsole":
439            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.ACCESS_CONSOLE)) {
440                openConsole(channel, model, vmChannel, vmDef, user, perms);
441            }
442            break;
443        case "cpus":
444            fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "currentCpus",
445                new BigDecimal(event.param(1).toString()).toBigInteger(),
446                vmChannel));
447            break;
448        case "ram":
449            fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "currentRam",
450                new Quantity(new BigDecimal(event.param(1).toString()),
451                    Format.BINARY_SI).toSuffixedString(),
452                vmChannel));
453            break;
454        default:// ignore
455            break;
456        }
457    }
458
459    private void confirmReset(NotifyConletModel event,
460            ConsoleConnection channel, VmsModel model, String vmName)
461            throws TemplateNotFoundException,
462            MalformedTemplateNameException, ParseException, IOException {
463        Template tpl = freemarkerConfig()
464            .getTemplate("VmMgmt-confirmReset.ftl.html");
465        ResourceBundle resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
466        var fmModel = fmModel(event, channel, model.getConletId(), model);
467        fmModel.put("vmName", vmName);
468        channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), model.getConletId(),
469            processTemplate(event, tpl, fmModel))
470                .addOption("cancelable", true).addOption("closeLabel", "")
471                .addOption("title",
472                    resourceBundle.getString("confirmResetTitle")));
473    }
474
475    private void openConsole(ConsoleConnection channel, VmsModel model,
476            VmChannel vmChannel, VmDefinition vmDef, String user,
477            Set<Permission> perms) {
478        ResourceBundle resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
479        if (!vmDef.consoleAccessible(user, perms)) {
480            channel.respond(new DisplayNotification(
481                resourceBundle.getString("consoleTakenNotification"),
482                Map.of("autoClose", 5_000, "type", "Warning")));
483            return;
484        }
485        var pwQuery = Event.onCompletion(new GetDisplayPassword(vmDef, user),
486            e -> {
487                var data = vmDef.connectionFile(e.password().orElse(null),
488                    preferredIpVersion, deleteConnectionFile);
489                if (data == null) {
490                    return;
491                }
492                channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
493                    model.getConletId(), "openConsole", data));
494            });
495        fire(pwQuery, vmChannel);
496    }
497
498    @Override
499    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleConnection channel,
500            String conletId) throws Exception {
501        return true;
502    }
503
504    /**
505     * The Class VmsModel.
506     */
507    public class VmsModel extends ConletBaseModel {
508
509        /**
510         * Instantiates a new vms model.
511         *
512         * @param conletId the conlet id
513         */
514        public VmsModel(String conletId) {
515            super(conletId);
516        }
517
518    }
519}
